overview: Prison can be a terrible place if youre a twink. Living in fear of dropping the soap in the shower or becoming a bitch to a big fat ugly inmate. But the prison officers are hard as nails too and the price is high if you disobey them! The four twinks in this latest Dads Fucking Lads feature soon find that out when these horny officer daddies set out to get what they want from their charges.
title: Officer Daddy
